name: MUMMY RELIVES
description:
Egypt - 2550 BC

Following Imhotep's destiny, an architect is requested to work on the greatest pyramid of the Century. One of the features of this pyramid is to become the most secured placed of the country.

After years of work, the pyramid was finally built. The architect had achieved finishing the most complex set of traps in the Egyptian era.

On the reveal date, the Architect decided to show how secure his pyramid was to the Pharaoh. The plan was to prove that only the people knowing the Pyramid's plans could enter this place.

The Architect died on the first trap that was setup...

 Osiris, God of the underworld, gives him a chance to redeem himself.

Should he succeed in surviving through rooms with similar traps that were setup in the pyramid built by himself, he will be brought back to life.

Should he fail, he will face eternal damnation...

Controls : Keyboard/Mouse OR Gamepad

KBM   WASD Movement, Mouse Camera, Spacebar Jump 

List of websites/assets packs used for making this game :

Model : Dungeon Assets - Quaternius → https://quaternius.com/packs/modulardungeon.html 

City of Brass (Epic Game Marketplace)

Infinity Blade : Effects (Epic Game Marketplace)

Plants : https://polyhaven.com/

Sounds : https://freesound.org/ , https://www.zapsplat.com/, https://freesfx.co.uk/, https://pixabay.com/,  https://sonniss.com/, https://sound-effects.bbcrewind.co.uk/

Images : https://pixabay.com/

Textures : https://ambientcg.com/

Github link : https://github.com/Romulus51/Project-IndianaMeatBoy
